Comment: From the article:  “Having a U.S. citizen child doesn’t make you immune from our laws of the country,” Homan said Sunday on CBS News’s “Face the Nation.” “American families get separated every day by law enforcement.”  Just days ago, a federal judge sounded the alarm after lawyers accused the Trump administration of deporting a 2-year-old U.S. citizen without “meaningful process.”  The child was deported alongside her sister and mother, who was found to be in the country illegally. Her father filed a petition for release.  A hearing on the matter is scheduled for May 16 in Louisiana.  Homan defended the decision for deportation, saying it’s on the parents if they put their children in that situation.  “Having a U.S. citizen child after you enter this country illegally is not a get out of jail free card,” he said.
